level.text: Prize payments shall be subject to all taxes and other withholdings required by law, and are subject to attachment for funds owed the District.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
